options.name: Student of Combat
options.description: On the first round of combat, you gain a bonus dice to all attack dice

options.name: Sharp Mind
options.description: Gain +1 skill with logic. When you are confused and roll a 6 or 7 on the confusion table, your confusion ends.

options.name: Reaction : Know Thy Enemy
options.description: In response to being targeted by a melee attack, you analyze your opponent's stance and technique. Roll an academics check with a single dice and add that die to your defense check pool.

options.name: Action : Find Weakness
options.description: You make a probing attack to study your opponent's defenses. Make an academics check with a single die as your attack roll. If the attack hits, you deal damage equal to your weapon's primary damage and learn one mitigation type or immunity of your choice that the target possesses.

options.name: Ancient Defenses
options.description: ou have studied the protective wards and divine rituals of ancient civilizations. Gain +1 skill with magic knowledge and +1 divine and +1 dark mitigation.

options.name: Warrior-Scholar
options.description: You combine battlefield medicine with anatomical knowledge to protect yourself and others. Gain +1 skill with medicine and +1 physical mitigation.

options.name: Daily Action : Attack of Legends
options.description: You channel the legendary techniques of history's greatest warriors into a single devastating strike. Roll both an academics check and a weapon attack, discarding the lowest die from each pool before combining them. If this attack defeats an elite tier or higher creature, your resolve is completely restored.
